resources.string: Â© 2024 Zhenxing Miao. All rights reserved.

In 2020, when I first started my professional journey, my initial learning project was a clock application. Unfortunately, in 2024, I lost the original clock app when I replaced my test device. Inspired by this, I decided to re-implement and optimize the clock application, naming it Zxing Clock.

The Zxing Clock application was developed out of pure interest and with heartfelt thanks to Wu Hui for their invaluable interaction support.

You can find the project on GitHub at https://github.com/ZhxM1995/Zxing-Clock. This project is released under the Apache License 2.0.

If you have any suggestions or feedback, feel free to contact me at mzx1217@gmail.com.
